titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of November as National Alzheimer's Disease Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
10/30/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Alzheimer's Disease Awareness Month.
Acknowledges: (1) the tragic impact Alzheimer's disease has on the lives of individuals in the United States, and (2) the progress and improvements neurological research has made in the diagnosis and treatment of Alzheimer's disease.
